location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter contains an explanation for a remark previously made by the Resident concerning the timely arrival of wool shipped to Bushire. It also notes that recent woollen sales have been slow, due to recent large imports of the material that they are having to compete with.
